summary: Developing software for DOD space systems, like GPS, has historically taken longer and cost billions of dollars more than planned. We looked at four software-intensive DOD space systems that had cost growth or delays. While DOD has started using better software development approaches, we found some challenges to making them work. For example, program offices and system developers don't consistently involve the systems' end users...
title: DOD Space Acquisitions: Including Users Early and Often in Software Development Could Benefit Programs
